ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and they would seek forgiveness before the dawn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and would ask for forgiveness at dawn,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and asked for forgiveness in the early morning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And used to seek forgiveness before dawn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And in the hours before dawn, they were asking for forgiveness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And in the morning they asked forgiveness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and in the mornings they would ask for forgiveness;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And ere the dawning of each day would seek forgiveness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: praying at dawn for God's pardon,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And in the dawns they prayed for forgiveness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and at dawns they would plead for forgiveness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And in the hour of early dawn, they (were found) praying for Forgiveness;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And in the hours before dawn, they were (found) asking (Allah) for forgiveness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and at dawn would ask forgiveness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And at dawn, they would pray for pardon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And in the hours before dawn they would ask forgiveness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:18] and at dawns they used to seek forgiveness: they used say, ‘Our Lord! Forgive us’,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And ere the dawning of each day would seek forgiveness) and at dawn they would pray,
